translations: n．挑剔，吹毛求疵：对小事或无关紧要的事情进行无理的批评或反驳。
· He is always full of cavils.
v．挑剔，吹毛求疵：对小事或无关紧要的事情进行无理的批评或反驳。
· She cavils at every little thing.
她对每件小事都吹毛求疵。

sentences.sentence: These cavils aside, most of the essays are very good indeed.
sentences.translation: 撇开这些吹毛求疵的意见，大多数论文确实非常好。

sentences.sentence: He cavils at being asked to cook his own breakfast.
sentences.translation: 他嗔怪让他自己做早饭。
